header: เครื่องทำน้ำอุ่น
งานบริการซ่อม
การคืนสินค้า

info_delivery.query: SELECT delivery_job_id, delivery_appoint, customer_name, customer_tel, delivery_product, brand_name AS delivery_brand, delivery_product_model, staff_name AS delivery_staff, delivery_location FROM info_delivery i JOIN staff s ON i.delivery_staff = s.staff_id JOIN customers c ON i.delivery_customer = c.customer_id JOIN brands b ON i.delivery_brand = b.brand_id WHERE delivery_location IS null

info_installation_ac.query: SELECT installac_id, installac_appoint, customer_name, customer_tel, installac_product, brand_name AS installac_brand, installac_model_in, staff_name AS installac_staff, installac_location FROM info_installation_ac i JOIN staff s ON i.installac_staff = s.staff_id JOIN customers c ON i.installac_customer = c.customer_id JOIN brands b ON i.installac_brand = b.brand_id WHERE installac_location IS null

info_installation_sat.query: SELECT installsat_id, installsat_appoint, customer_name, customer_tel, installsat_product, brand_name AS installsat_brand, installsat_model_lnb, staff_name AS installsat_staff, installsat_location FROM info_installation_sat i JOIN staff s ON i.installsat_staff = s.staff_id JOIN customers c ON i.installsat_customer = c.customer_id JOIN brands b ON i.installsat_brand = b.brand_id WHERE installsat_location IS null

info_installation_wh.query: SELECT installwh_id, installwh_appoint, customer_name, customer_tel, installwh_product, brand_name AS installwh_brand, installwh_model, staff_name AS installwh_staff, installwh_location FROM info_installation_wh i JOIN staff s ON i.installwh_staff = s.staff_id JOIN customers c ON i.installwh_customer = c.customer_id JOIN brands b ON i.installwh_brand = b.brand_id WHERE installwh_location IS null

A0.text: รอแจ้งบริษัท

A1.text: แจ้งไม่สำเร็จ

B1.text: ส่งคืนแล้ว

C0.text: กำลังติดตาม

C1.text: รอบริษัทดำเนินการ

D1.text: รอเอกสารชดเชย

D2.text: รอเอกสารชดเชย

E.text: ชดเชยเรียบร้อย
